Name: monoammonium phosphate production | monoammonium phosphate | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds
Description: This datasets corresponds to the technology used in North American fertiliser plants. The production of monoammonium phosphate involves the combination of liquid ammonia with phosphate rock, using steam.
